Comment: >"Court records show Dickey was involved in 40 criminal and traffic cases between 2013 and the present. Why are people like this even still out on the fucking street? 40 cases in the last dozen years. So basically back in court or under arrest every 3 to 4 months for 12 years straight, on average.   And to make it even fucking worse, she was asleep when he shot her.
